[
    EchoOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: LiteralString {
            span: Span(
                1,
                5,
            ),
            value: "<?php\n",
        },
        ending: CloseTag(
            Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\nsome html\n",
    ),
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            3,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Echo {
        echo: Span(
            4,
            5,
        ),
        values: [
            LiteralString {
                span: Span(
                    4,
                    10,
                ),
                value: "// ",
            },
        ],
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                4,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
    ClosingTag(
        Span(
            5,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    InlineHtml(
        "\n",
    ),
]
